snippet.title: Bashful Adoration - Official Announcement Trailer | Women-Led Games x TGA 2024
snippet.description: Here's your look at the announcement trailer for Bashful Adoration, an upcoming game where you fight for your love with 2-4 friends locally or online. In Bashful Adoration, soar the skies on your broom, and dash and smash props and opponents until they're a twinkling dot on the horizon! Secure powerups, land devastating blows, and win the adoration of your crush! Bashful Adoration will be available in 2025 on PC.
